content.raw: I think the issue is that the gazebo\_ros\_color plugin is being loaded before the gazebo\_ros\_api plugin \(timing dependent, so wont happen every time\). One solution is to spawn the light buoy separately after gazebo is brough up \(just like the WAM-V\) instead of including it the world file.
content.html: I think the issue is that the gazebo_ros_color plugin is being loaded before the gazebo_ros_api plugin (timing dependent, so wont happen every time). One solution is to spawn the light buoy separately after gazebo is brough up (just like the WAM-V) instead of including it the world file.
